entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:26 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
